scenes.heading: EXT. NEW YORK CITY - DAWN
scenes.actionPreview: 1 1 Establishing: An aerial view of New York City’s iconic skyline as the sun crests the horizon. OPENING CREDITS: Titles begin: BANG! The sound of bone impacting wood echoes.

scenes.heading: EXT. NYC / STREET - DAWN
scenes.actionPreview: 1A 1A A low rent part of town, gritty and industrial. A symbol is spray painted on a wall: an “X” with an “0” on each side and a jagged “line” above. This is HOBO SYMBOL and in the language of the street it means: “ a safe place.”

scenes.heading: INT. NYC / BOWERY KING’S WORLD / UNDERGROUND - DAWN

dialogues.text: “I am the way into the city of woe, I am the way into eternal pain, I am the way to go among the lost.”

scenes.heading: EXT. THE DESERT - DAWN

dialogues.text: ; the One Who Sits Above the Table. THE ELDER’S POV:
Mr. Wick. To what do I owe the pleasure?
My ring, my freedom. JW takes a knee .....
Then I’m afraid you’ve come a very long way for nothing.
Your ring is gone , like the Elder before me and if you came here thinking you could end this by killing me , you are mistaken....
For you to help me change their minds.
As I said , no on escapes who they are...Im afraid you’ve come a long way for nothing....
Yeah.....me too. BOOM! The shot rings out, echoing across the desert and far beyond.
Tell them. Tell them all. I’m going to kill them. I’m going to kill them all.

scenes.actionPreview: 10A 10A WIDE. The sun -- blood orange, massive -- slowly rises, illuminating the wide and featureless desert flats. Three Arabians thunder by. The Table has reason to believe that this facility is providing services

I know you’ve been supporting him in his... travels.
If memory serves, the last time you saw him, you shot him. Off a goddamn roof.
I had no choice. The Table held all the cards.
Enough! I have to see Jonathan. He needs to know the breadth of what is coming for him. This Marquis isn’t constrained -- The Table has let him off his leash.
Ah, your benevolence is touching. I’m sure this has nothing to do with this pile of rocks. Or the gravestone of your former concierge...
Tell me something and tell it true: why did that Frenchman let you live? SALMON REVISED - 28.1.2022
To make a point. A dead man can be made a martyr. But you let him live and you tell the world that he is either a turncoat, a coward, or a fool.
(taps the card to his head) I have John Wick.

dialogues.text: But this isn’t your home anymore, is it...

dialogues.text: Must be Christmas... But where are my manners?

Each thinks they have a winning hand.
Just so you know, Petr wasn’t personal.

dialogues.text: A warning of the cost of tyranny.
A reminder of the price of complacency in the face of dissent. ANOTHER ANGLE to include Winston standing some dozen yards away, flanked by Chidi and Myrmidons.
You must intend to join your concierge.
You say that as though you have a choice.
Per the Old Ways and the old laws,
You talk of the Old Ways as if you know them. A man of Mr. Wick’s...
And why would I accept this from a second rate seat?
Because there are rules, and without them--
That time is passed, Mr. Manager. A new day is dawning. New ideas. New rules. New management.
Yet you will accept because we still
And what exactly are Mr. Wick’s terms?
History is littered with Marquis’ who are remembered only by their servants... But you can be remembered as the man who brought
As his Second, upon his victory, my
Well, how you do anything is how you do everything. Now, I’m done.
You’ve found renewed purpose. SALMON REVISED - 28.1.2022
He who has a ‘why’ to live for can bear almost any ‘how.’
I rather think I’ll miss you when you’re gone.
I wish I could say the same.
A man’s Second, like his Sponsor, either walks out with his champion or is buried beside him... the Old

scenes.heading: INT. PARIS / PLACE DU TROCADÉRO - DAY

dialogues.text: , six male, six female, all about thirty, all sporting identical crewcuts and wearing matching suits with Mandarin collars, flank the square. Part Jesuit part Immortal, these men and women serve the interests of The
Under the old laws, only one can survive; do you both understand?
Very well. Rules. (motions to The Marquis)
You come here thinking there is a way out of this world for you, Mr.
If you win, The Table will honor its word. You will have your freedom, but you won’t take it.
Dueling pistols. Thirty paces. In the event that both parties survive, each will approach the other in increments of ten paces until only one remains. Rules of engagement?

You won’t take it as this is who you are, who you’ve always been. We allow you to think of yourself as some sort of Paladin or Samurai - serving nobly at the arm of your feudal Lord. Part of the comical artifice of this little world of ours. But the truth is that you are simply a killer. An orphan we plucked from the street and honed into a knife. And it is the killing that gives you purpose. And purpose gives men like you identity. (to the Harbinger)
If there is nothing else-- SALMON REVISED - 28.1.2022
Sunrise, Sacré Coeur, dueling pistols, no quarter. Mr. Wick elects to duel, The Marquis nominates Caine as his Champion.
Should The Marquis Vincent Bisset de Gramont be victorious--
John Wick will be dead, as will his
If there is nothing else, gentlemen, I will see you at sunrise. Failure to meet at the appointed hour will result in forfeiture and immediate execution.
I have seen many like you who claim to want out. But that is always a lie. There is no “John” out there.
And he is going to kill you.
Oh, grow up, Jonathan. If I’d asked for nothing, he would have shot me where I stood.
You always have an angle, don’t you?
Doesn’t everyone?... He’ll unleash the dogs now.
We’d best go to safe harbor, then.
There’s something I need to do first.
Don’t be too long. ANGLE ON The Marquis, watching as John and Winston walk in opposite directions.
I won’t do it. ANOTHER ANGLE to include Caine standing behind The Marquis. SALMON REVISED - 28.1.2022
This is High Table. There are rules. Fight your own duel.
You will because when John Wick is dead by your hand in that duel, you and your daughter will be free.
It’s personal. PULL BACK as Caine moves away from the Marquis.... SALMON REVISED - 28.1.2022

dialogues.text: A little far from home, aren’t you?
When you don’t have a house, the world is your home. And your little act of uncivil disobedience has inspired me. I’m branching out.
So it seems... 42 regular, wasn’t it?
Appropriate for all formal occasions: weddings, funerals... and High Table Duels. After all, a man’s got to look his best when its time to get married... or buried. SALMON REVISED - 28.1.2022
By giving John Wick a chance to go free?
It was the most... direct option.
For making you look like a fool.
My victory will do the opposite.
A man’s ambition should never be greater than his worth. You’d be wise to remember that, sir.
Forgive me, sir, but this is madness.
Trusting your fate to a blind man’s bullet. SALMON REVISED - 28.1.2022

There are three kinds of men in this world: those who have something to live for, those who have something to die for, and those who have something to kill for. John Wick has none of these things. He is but a ghost in search of a graveyard. But that blind man?

Round and round she goes, where she stops, nobody knows.

scenes.heading: INT. PARIS / GARAGE - NIGHT
scenes.actionPreview: 109A 109A A row of black BMWs idle. Myrmidons stand at attention. Chidi enters the garage and heads for a sedan. Myrmidons climb in and the six sedans pull out. 110 111 SALMON REVISED - 28.1.2022 97. SALMON REVISED - 28.1.2022 98. 112 113 SALMON REVISED - 28.1.2022 98. SALMON REVISED - 28.1.2022 99.

scenes.actionPreview: 115 115 The Barracuda slides into frame. The Arc de Triumph looms ahead. John heads for it, entering the circle as the black BMWs converge from the opposite direction. Within moments, we’re in a demolition derby with the added fun of guns. Shots fired. John cranks the wheel and the Barracuda spins o

scenes.heading: INT. PARIS / MAP ROOM - NIGHT

dialogues.text: How did you get this number? SALMON REVISED - 28.1.2022

scenes.actionPreview: 115A 115A The Marquis stares at the map. A VALET, carrying a corded gold and ivory rotary telephone on a silver tray, approaches. The Marquis takes the receiver. 99. SALMON REVISED - 28.1.2022 99A.

scenes.heading: EXT. PARIS / UTE - NIGHT

dialogues.text: The question you should be asking is: “How much?”
I think we have the situation well under control. ANGLE ON The Tracker, eye pressed against the scope of his rifle.
Way I see it, if Johnny makes it to the church on time, this’ll be your last day as Marquis. What I’m offering is a guarantee that he won’t.

scenes.actionPreview: 115B 115B He fires! A Myrmidon drops!

scenes.heading: INT. PARIS / MAP ROOM - NIGHT

dialogues.text: I seem to remember you had some qualms about killing.
Killing pays better. And better is now thirty million. Oh, and the finder’s fee you still owe me from

scenes.actionPreview: 115C 115C Berlin. The line goes dead. The Marquis is... unsure.

scenes.heading: INT. PARIS / UTE - NIGHT

dialogues.text: Word on the street is we have ourselves a third party in the mix-- SALMON REVISED - 28.1.2022

scenes.actionPreview: 116 116 The Tracker sights and fires again! Another Myrmidon drops. The dog whimpers. The Tracker looks at him. The dog springs forward and hurtles towards the fight. 99A. SALMON REVISED - 28.1.2022 99B.

dialogues.text: --if you catch my drift. SALMON REVISED - 28.1.2022

scenes.actionPreview: 116A 116A Caine sits alone at the bar, untouched drink in front of him, listening as the radio plays. 99B. SALMON REVISED - 28.1.2022 100.

scenes.actionPreview: 117 117 John drops a Myrmidon. Another. One gets behind John. He’s about to shoot John when the dog hits him, taking the man down. John sees it-- He dives as a BMW almost hits him. A second. Three Myrmidons step out of the first, firing. Chidi is amongst them. The second tries to run John down. The

scenes.heading: INT. PARIS / UTE - NIGHT

dialogues.text: Here’s an update for all you nightcrawlers, vampires, werewolves and things that go bump in the night...

scenes.actionPreview: 118 118 The Tracker sees his dog hit. He opens fire on the sedan! Slugs tear into it as it accelerates after John. Then the Tacker turns the ute's engine over and floors it! As he pulls away, the dog matches him and leaps into the moving vehicle. 119 SALMON REVISED - 28.1.2022 100. SALMON REVISED -

scenes.heading: EXT. PARIS / STREETS - NIGHT

dialogues.text: I’m hearing the boys in black couldn’t get it done and the number just went up.
For my special friends Louis and

scenes.actionPreview: 120 120 John drives hard as the first hints of the soon to be rising sun turn the black of night into the gray of pre-dawn. A sedan cuts in front of John. He spins. Another behind him. Men step out of the sedans. SALMON REVISED - 28.1.2022 100A. SALMON REVISED - 28.1.2022 101. These have military gr

scenes.heading: INT. PARIS / BAR - NIGHT

dialogues.text: (to the female bar tender, in French)

scenes.actionPreview: 120A 120A Caine still at the bar, still listening to the radio. Could you call me a cab, please?

scenes.heading: INT. PARIS / APARTMENT BUILDING - NIGHT
scenes.actionPreview: 121 121 A Main Rouge is waiting for John, shotgun lined. John shoots the man as he shoots John. Both go down and both get up. But John’s faster, dumping rounds into the attacker, knocking him back, grabbing his shotgun, flipping it, shoving it under his helmet and pulling the trigger.

scenes.heading: EXT. PARIS / APARTMENT BUILDING ALLEY - NIGHT
scenes.actionPreview: 121A 121A More Main Rouge enter the apartment.

scenes.heading: INT. PARIS / APARTMENT BUILDING - NIGHT
scenes.actionPreview: 121B 121B John moves fast, firing at the door as the attackers pour in. Then he runs up the stairs. Takes cover behind a solid banister, re-loads. Fires. Runs some more. Puts rounds into a wall and punches through it. Turns up another flight of stairs and come face to face with-- SALMON REVISED - 28

scenes.heading: INT. PARIS / MAP ROOM - NIGHT
scenes.actionPreview: 122 122 The Marquis looks at the clock. 6:12 am . Then the map. John’s flag is close to Sacre Coeur. A Valet approaches with a phone and offers it to The Marquis.

scenes.heading: INT. PARIS / APARTMENT BUILDING - NIGHT

dialogues.text: You have a deal. SALMON REVISED - 28.1.2022
Well, that is the only deal that is being offered today. A life for a life, Mr. Marquis; yours or his.

scenes.actionPreview: 123 123 The Tracker shoots a Main Rouge. Another. His phone rings. He taps the earbud. SALMON REVISED - 28.1.2022 102. The Track

scenes.heading: EXT. PARIS / MAP ROOM - NIGHT
scenes.actionPreview: 124 124 The line goes dead. The Marquis... throws the phone. It bounces off of polished marble, shedding pieces. He paces. Stops. Looks at the clock: 6:14, then back at the map... Phone! A Valet scurries forward with another phone.

scenes.heading: INT. PARIS / APARTMENT BUILDING - NIGHT

dialogues.text: What we’ve got here is a failure to remunerate...
Some men you just can’t reach.

scenes.actionPreview: 125 125 John backs into an apartment, killing men, moves through it, out another door into the hall, killing more as the dog takes others down and The Tracker snipes yet others. The Tracker keys his earbud as his phone rings. He and the Marquis continue to negotiate as he kills Main Rouge: Chidi and

scenes.heading: EXT. PARIS / APARTMENT BUILDING / ALLEY - PRE-DAWN
scenes.actionPreview: 126 126 John hits the alley hard. The steps leading to Sacre Coeur are a half block away and he runs for them.

scenes.heading: EXT. PARIS / SACRE COEUR - PRE-DAWN
scenes.actionPreview: 127 127 A white Bentley pulls up. Doors open. The Marquis steps out as Winston appears from a side street and approaches. The Harbinger waits in the courtyard in front of the Church flanked by the dozen High Table Guardians. In front of them is a gravel strip with markers laid out at 30, 20, and 10

scenes.heading: EXT. PARIS / BASE OF STAIRS - PRE-DAWN
scenes.actionPreview: 128 128 John -- bruised, shot, bleeding -- gets to the bottom of the steps. At the top of the hill is Sacré-Coeur. Between him and the church is a narrow and steep stairway consisting of 300 steps framed by cafes, shops, and apartments. He glances at a clock: 6:20 am. 13 minutes until sunrise as he

scenes.heading: EXT. PARIS / SACRE COEUR - PRE-DAWN
scenes.actionPreview: 129 129 John crests the top of the stairs with six minutes to spare. The church rises up, beckoning. The Marquis and Winston are there, waiting, as is the Harbinger. John made it. Then three Myrmidons rush John. He kills one, a second. Clicks empty as the third -- a mountain of a man -- fires. Slugs

scenes.heading: EXT. PARIS / STAIRS - PRE-DAWN
scenes.actionPreview: 130 130 The weight of the man forces them back to the edge of the top stair. They teeter for a moment and-- FALL, tumbling... ass over heels... down... by bodies... more bodies... down some more... for exactly 300 steps... John pushes the Myrmidon’s body off him and looks back up those 300 steps...

scenes.heading: EXT. PARIS / SACRE COEUR - PRE-DAWN
scenes.actionPreview: 131 131 A pissed off Chidi, with a Myrmidon team in tow, marches by The Marquis and Winston without a word. The Tracker and his dog approach from the other direction. Chidi and the dog exchange an unpleasant look.

scenes.heading: EXT. PARIS / STAIRS - PRE-DAWN

dialogues.text: I need you to make it to the top of those stairs, John. So... are you ready?

scenes.actionPreview: 132 132 Caine... extends his hand. John... takes it and Caine helps him to his feet. SALMON REVISED - 28.1.2022 105. SALMON REVISED - 28.1.2022 106. John glances at his watch and then the skyline. The crown of the sun is just visible on the horizon. John clenches his fist. A drop of blood drips from

scenes.heading: EXT. PARIS / SACRE COEUR - DAWN

dialogues.text: It appears Mr. Wick won’t be joining us.

scenes.actionPreview: 134 134 The Marquis and Winston eye one another. The second bell tolls. The Harbinger steps up behind Winston, draws a very large handgun and lines it on the back on Winston’s head. The third bell tolls. The Harbinger cocks the gun.

scenes.heading: EXT. PARIS / STAIRS - DAWN

dialogues.text: You shouldn’t have kicked my dog.

scenes.actionPreview: 135 135 John takes a bullet to the chest. Caine catches him, supporting him as he drops the shooter. SALMON REVISED - 28.1.2022 106. SALMON REVISED - 28.1.2022 107-109. scenes.heading: EXT. PARIS / SACRE COEUR - DAWN

dialogues.text: ‘We seek the truth and will endure the consequences.’ JOHN/CAINE/THE MARQUIS/WINSTON
You may inspect your weapons, gentlemen.
There is something quite poetic about all this, don’t you think? SALMON REVISED - 28.1.2022
Il dort dans le soleil, la main sur sa poitrine, Tranquille. Il a deux trous rouges au côté droit...
Remember our deal. WITH JOHN AND WINSTON: As John chambers a blood stained bullet.
Perhaps aim for the more important parts.
Your weapon. Give it to me.
You arrogant, bloviating twat... he didn’t shoot.
Your obligation to The Table is satisfied, John Wick. You are... free. (turning to Caine) ...as are you and your daughter, sir.
Where’s he going? ANOTHER ANGLE to include The Tracker, looking after John.
Well... at least we’re not dead.

scenes.actionPreview: 136 136 SALMON REVISED - 28.1.2022 107-109. SALMON REVISED - 28.1.2022 110. Winston lets out a breath as the Harbinger lowers his weapon. John pulls himself to his feet. A blade flashes in Caine’s hand and stabs through John’s right hand! Caine pulls the blade out and blood wells on the wound even a

scenes.heading: EXT. PARIS / SACRE COEUR / OVERLOOK - MORNING
scenes.actionPreview: 137 137 John slowly makes his way to the railing. Paris stretches out in front of him as the sun rises behind him. John holds the railing for a long moment, and looks out over the city with the eyes of a free man. He slowly slides down to the ground, his back against the railing. He sits there for a

scenes.heading: EXT. MANHATTAN / CEMETERY - AFTERNOON

dialogues.text: I never thought I’d live to see the day... I wonder where he is?
We’ll never know... All we can do is wish Jonathan the very best.

scenes.actionPreview: 138 138 A sun shower gently falls. The drops, illuminated by the sun’s rays, seem to sparkle in this, the magic hour. Winston, The Bowery King -- in a tailored suit -- and John’s dog stand together, paying their silent respects. Winston glances at the King. 115. SALMON REVISED - 28.1.2022 115A. Now
